net.edudb.console

Class DatabaseConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edudb.console.DatabaseConsole

  • public class DatabaseConsole
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton that handles the console and its commands.
    Author:
    Ahmed Abdul Badie
